question:
12. Q:....Does he love his mother?    A....
a.he love his mother
b.he lovers his mother
c.he to love his mother
d.he is loving his mother​

related_questions.question:
Dinda    (run) so fast because there
(be) a dog
Mia and her friend
(borrow) some books from the library
The school janitor
(sweep) the floor last night.
Mr Betty
(teach) and
(speak) English in the class.
My family
(miss) the plane because we (wake up) late​

answers.answer:
Dinda is running so fast because there is a dog

Mia and her friends are borrowing some books from the library

The school janitor was sweeping the floor last night

My Betty teaches and speaks English in the class

My Family missed the plane because we woke up late

related_questions.question:
My mom buys some oranges.... are very    sour.the appropriate pronun is....
A.it B.they C.we D.he​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

They

Penjelasan:

Oranges are plural therefore you use the pronoun 'they'

related_questions.question: 1. i will ... this beautiful scenery 2. ... a traditional song ia my hobby 3. let's.... with me. i will be romeo and you will be juliet
When was he chosen as minister of education? *

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

When was he chosen as minister of education?

He was chosen as the minister of education in 2019.

Penjelasan:

Kalimat menggunakan bentuk Passive dari Simple Past Tense:

(+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

related_questions.question:
2. She's tall Her hair is straight. Her skin is smooth    What does "Skin" mean in Indonesia !
a.RAMBUT 
b.tinggi
c.dagu
e.kulit

ayo di jawab
di follow yah
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

E. Kulit

Penjelasan:

Bahasa Indonesia skin adalah kulit. Semoga membantu ya!

related_questions.question: The shop...late yesterday a. closed B. close C closes d. closing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. closed

Penjelasan:

Kenapa yang closed? Karena disitu udah ada kata yesterday yang dimana artinya kemarin sehingga harus menggunakan Past Tense yang dimana past tense ini verbnya (kata kerja) menggunakan bentuk kedua.

related_questions.question:
The following statements are true, except..    a. Dewi has two sister
b. Dewi always go to school early in the morning
c. Lina is a diligent girl
d. Dewi often visit Siti's house​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Dewi has two sister

Penjelasan:

maaf ya kalau salah, semangat belajar nya

related_questions.question:
What do the snakes do...?
a.slither
b.move
c.walk
d.slide​

answers.answer:
A. SLITHER

Penjelasan

Slither: merayap atau melata(karena ular tidak mempunyai kaki)

Move: pindah

Walk: Berjalan ( gak ada kakinya)

Slide: meluncur (kurang tepat)

JADIKAN JAWABAN TERBAIK JIKA ANDA MERASA TERBANTU✨
